thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 4 of 137
thread.title: Asher Arnold

author: Asher Arnold
title: Asher Arnold
text:
Me and my girlfriend were going out of town for the holidays this past year and we needed someone to watch our dog, previously family members have helped. We didn't want to put him in a kennel, so I went online and found DogVacay. It's like the AirBandB for dogs. People make a profile and offer their services to watch your dog at their house or apartment, they name their price per night. We have used it three times now with three different dog sitters. We used three different dog sitters not because any of them were bad, but because the first ones moved and the second ones were not available the third time.
Check out the site, I would recommend it 100%.
